T02D2452:90a-1: ma h'a mu dra ratna g'i ta tsa kra n'a ma /
T02D2452:90a-3: phyag rgya chen po rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
T02D2452:90a-4: bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2452:90a-5: gser la ra med ka 'ji'i rdo la rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2452:90a-6: 'dra man rnams ni tshong 'dus dag tu rgyug par 'gyur //
T02D2452:90a-7: gser zol skor zhing 'khor nas gnas po'i lag tu 'bab pa yin //
T02D2452:90a-8: phra men ma ni ma bsten 'gyur te rten 'brel thams cad su yis bsgrigs //
T02D2452:90a-9: ded dpon mkhas pa grong dang gling phran tshong spangs rin chen gling nas nor bu len //
T02D2452:90a-10: phyi ba dar byas tshe rgyal mtshan rtse la mchod pas dgos 'dod 'byung //
T02D2452:90a-11: rin chen gsum ngo shes pa'i ded dpon 'dzam bu'i gling na dkon //
T02D2452:90a-12: srad la zhal lce bcol bas che chung med par gcod de rtsod dang bral //
T02D2452:90a-13: 'gron po lam zhugs bar gyi grong dang grong khyer ri sul bgrod nas don 'grub pa //
T02D2452:90b-0: gi ling rta po mgyogs kyang lcag gis brabs na de bas mgyogs @90b par 'gyur //
T02D2452:90b-1: ltas ngan chen po byed pa'i mi de su yi rigs rgyud yin //
T02D2452:90b-2: dmigs med tshogs sog byed pa rgya mtsho chen po mkhas //
T02D2452:90b-3: bya yi tshogs la mda' 'phangs gang la phog pa de dag 'gum //
T02D2452:90b-4: ri mtsho tsandan gsum gyis bya glang sbrul gsum skyabs 'go bcug pa shes lags sam //
T02D2452:90b-5: ras yug dkar po tshur nas bton nas tshos ma'i lag tu btang bas gang 'dod 'byung //
T02D2452:90b-6: mdzub bsgreng srin mtheb nang du mdzub mo bcug cing
T02D2452:90b-7: mkha' la bsgreng ba'i don ldan brdar shes par chad
T02D2452:90b-8: med // bung ba khri snyan phyi ba gsum gyis shes rab gsum gyi sbyor ba ngo mtshar che //
T02D2452:90b-9: 'du ba gso byed sman pa'i rgyal po mnyes pa yis //
T02D2452:90b-10: rin chen bdun sbyor spyi bo gtsug bshal btang nas ni //
T02D2452:90b-11: sha rus khrag sogs smin cing lus kyi 'byung ba rtas par byed //
T02D2452:90b-12: tshangs pa chen po'i gsung dbyangs khyod kyis mnyan par gyis //
T02D2452:90b-13: seng ge'i 'o ma btsun mos bzhos pa'i bcud mchog ngo mtshar can //
T02D2452:90b-14: 'di ni gang gis 'thungs dang lce la reg pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2452:90b-15: rtsa grol rlung zin thig la dros pa'i nus mthu 'byung //
T02D2452:90b-16: au ma de ba len pa'i glu de mchog tu snyan pa yin pas gson //
T02D2452:90b-17: snang ba thob nas dben pa'i sa phyogs der ni rang gi gnas btsal la //
T02D2452:90b-18: rgyan gyis spras shing mdzes ldan bdag med yum gyi zhabs la 'dud //
T02D2452:90b-19: gtan gyi bde ba blangs pa nam mkha' rdo rje
T02D2452:90b-20: grong du gzhug / srid pa'i rgyal mo len pa'i
T02D2452:90b-21: glu la yid gtad bya bar rigs //
T02D2452:90b-22: rang byung shel gyi mchod rten skyon bral ye nas dag pa la//
T02D2452:90b-23: snang srid gsal byed 'phrul gyi me long phyis te blta bar bya //
T02D2452:90b-24: mo gsham bu yis bden pa mthong ba'i don de gang yin khyod kyis smros //
T02D2452:90b-25: khyab 'jug chen po rang gis blangs pa'i glu la yid brtan byed //
T02D2452:90b-26: khrus khang dag na dri mas dri ma ma lus dag par byed //
T02D2452:90b-27: med bzhin snang ba mkha' la bris pa'i 'ja' ltar gzungs sku rnam gnyis gang zhig yin //
T02D2452:90b-28: sbrang rgod zos pa'i rtsa la byin rlabs rgyas par byed //
T02D2452:90b-29: skyur nad can dang rma dkris gnyis la chags pa'i zhen pa cang gda' 'am //
T02D2452:90b-30: dri dang sgog pa g-yer ma phyed par snang ba gzugs brnyan 'di 'dra rtogs lags sam /
T02D2452:91a-0: @91a * // chu zla bzhin du snang la rang bzhin med pa mig gi rnam shes nyams su myong bas gzigs //
T02D2452:91a-1: 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i nad la sman pa rnams kyis drod tshad 'dzin //
T02D2452:91a-2: bshal rjes mi srung rtag tu bsrung ba ma lags sam //
T02D2452:91a-3: gnam lcags sa la bab na gang la babs pa'i yul de 'jig par byed //
T02D2452:91a-4: mkha' la 'brug gi sgra bsgrags dbyar dgun shan 'dang de yis phyed par 'gyur //
T02D2452:91a-5: sprul pa'i dge slong mkhas pa 'gro 'chag nyal du ston kyang skyo dub med //
T02D2452:91a-6: gser gyi ri la brten pa'i bya yang de yi mdog tu 'gyur //
T02D2452:91a-7: snang yang de bzhin spyod pa'i sgyu ma mkhan dang rtag tu 'grogs //
T02D2452:91a-8: zhing pa'i lo tog rten 'brel rab tu 'dzom pas 'bras bu ston rnams sdud //
T02D2452:91a-9: mchod sdong nyi zla nor bus rtog pa med bzhin 'gro ba'i don la brtson //
T02D2452:91a-10: so btang bum par chu bskyed mi 'chag snod kyi bya ba byed //
T02D2452:91a-11: ka la pidka'i sgra bzhin tshangs pa'i gsung gis bag
T02D2452:91a-12: chags sgrib pa 'dag / rlung gi rta la dran
T02D2452:91a-13: pa'i srab kyis mkha' la btags la dbu ma'i khyim
T02D2452:91a-14: du gzhug / lo zla 'das pa'i ma bu phrad
T02D2452:91a-15: bzhin nges pa'i shes pa skye //
T02D2452:91a-16: nya dang chu las 'byung ba gos su gyon pas zhen pa cang gda' 'am //
T02D2452:91a-17: me long shel bzhin khong ras gsal stong byas pa
T02D2452:91a-18: med pa lta ba mchog / dangs ma'i chu la
T02D2452:91a-19: bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal dangs phyed par snang //
T02D2452:91a-20: 'gron po lam zhugs nye ring med par phyin nas 'dod pa'i mi dang phrad //
T02D2452:91a-21: rgyal po'i khrims la 'bangs kyis dam tshig gces par bsrungs pa legs //
T02D2452:91a-22: rma bya'i zas su btsan dug zos pas stobs su 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che //
T02D2452:91a-23: rin chen gser de sa la gnas kyang 'od zer mkha' la 'char //
T02D2452:91a-24: bag ma bung ba seng ge smyon pa bzhi po spyod pa 'dzol //
T02D2452:91a-25: rlung dang yi ge rnam shes gsum po 'grogs la tshangs pa'i mthong lam snyogs //
T02D2452:91a-26: sa 'gus mchod sdong btsugs pa'i sa der klu yi 'jigs pa mi bdog go //
T02D2452:91a-27: rin po che la rtog pa med kyang gsol ba btab na dgos 'dod 'byung //
T02D2452:91a-28: mkha' la sprin tshogs 'dus nas char gyis 'gro don mdzad //
T02D2452:91a-29: rgyal bu rgyal sar bzhag nas 'bangs rnams kun gyis 'khur bar byed //
T02D2452:91b-0: mkha' @91b la nyi ma shar ba'i mun pa'i tshogs la bsdad dbang med mod kyi //
T02D2452:91b-1: nyi zla ngos gzung chu bo gyen la zlog pa
T02D2452:91b-2: grangs pas gangs dkar rtse nas zhu ba ngo mtshar
T02D2452:91b-3: che // ma ga dha ru rdo rje'i gdan du
T02D2452:91b-4: bsdad pa'i rgyal ba sprul pa'i sku de su yin
T02D2452:91b-5: che // lo // drang srong rnams ni kham gyi zas la ma brten bsam gtan thun gyis 'tsho //
T02D2452:91b-6: rdo rje gdan la dbang po bstan pas nam mkha'i bsgrub bya med par rtogs //
T02D2452:91b-7: myong zhing smra ma nus pa'i bcu drug lon pa'i bde ba su la bslangs //
T02D2452:91b-8: mkha' la shar ba'i rgyu skar rnams kyis nam zla dus bzhi'i dong tshad 'dzin //
T02D2452:91b-9: bzhin gyi dri ma sel ba'i me long 'di la sgeg mes gces par 'dzin //
T02D2452:91b-10: rgyal po'i khang bzangs dag na btsun mo 'dod yon rtag tu spyod kyang de la zhen pa med //
T02D2452:91b-11: gang gis 'joms par mi nus pha lam rdzas kyi rdo rje yin //
T02D2452:91b-12: drang srong rnams kyis tshe yi rig 'dzin grub pa gang gi stobs las byung //
T02D2452:91b-13: btsog pa'i chol zangs snying po bor nas rin chen snod mdzes tshol ba thabs la mkhas //
T02D2452:91b-14: rdo yi skyes bu srin mo'i gling la nyam nga
T02D2452:91b-15: med de gang gi rtog / nam mkha'i mdzod la
T02D2452:91b-16: longs spyod nus na dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bral //
T02D2452:91b-17: dmyal ba la sogs rigs drug dag la bde gshegs sku gdung 'brul //
T02D2452:91b-18: dug la sngags kyis thebs pas 'du ba'i nad rnams thams cad 'joms //
T02D2452:91b-19: mkha' la nyi ma shar ba skar ma la sogs
T02D2452:91b-20: snang gzhan zil gyis mnan pas nam mkha'i dkyil ltar
T02D2452:91b-21: mthong // ka ra na bcings chu yi 'gro 'od
T02D2452:91b-22: chad nas gzhon nu me long blta zhing nam mkha'i
T02D2452:91b-23: dkyil na 'dug / rab rib mig ser sol ba
T02D2452:91b-24: dung la ser por mthong ba'i 'khrul pa dus der
T02D2452:91b-25: zhig / gshed mas khrid pa'i mi de thar nas
T02D2452:91b-26: dpa' mdzangs de yi lag tu cang 'gro'am //
T02D2452:91b-27: nam mkha' dag pa'i 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs su bris pa gang na med //
T02D2452:91b-28: nam zhig mu ge'i dus su bu sha zos kyang de la chags pa cang skye'am //
T02D2452:91b-29: bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas yin min rten 'brel thams cad rtogs /
T02D2452:91b-30: rdo yi mi la sdom pa dam tshig phog kyang bsrung dang nyams pa'i rig byed med //
T02D2452:92a-0: rtog bral ro de gang la mi 'jigs nus mthu su yis byin @92a * //
T02D2452:92a-2: dangs pa'i mkha' la gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung ba shes pa'i drang srong mkhas pa yin //
T02D2452:92a-3: ri dags drang srong lta bu gcig pur 'dug pa'i mi des bden pa myur du thob //
T02D2452:92a-4: 'byung ba gyes pas dngul chu mkha' la 'phur bar gang nas 'ongs //
T02D2452:92a-5: rnyog ma'i dri ma can gyi chu la nor bu bcug pa'i stobs kyis dangs par 'gyur //
T02D2452:92a-6: bde gshegs bems po ltar snang sman dang sman dang chu stegs dang zam pa de mchod kyis //
T02D2452:92a-7: rtog med 'byung bas 'gro drug 'dod pa dus su skong ba ngo mtshar che //
T02D2452:92a-8: rin chen gling du phyin nas sa rdo btsal med ci snyed thams cad rin po che //
T02D2452:92a-9: mkha' la sprin gyis 'khrigs na nyi ma'i 'od zer snang ba min //
T02D2452:92a-10: gang rdugs lam de bsal na chu de 'dod pa'i gnas su 'gro //
T02D2452:92a-11: kha brag lam na 'dug pa'i mi de grogs kyi rkyen gyis gar 'gro'i cha yang med //
T02D2452:92a-12: nor bu rin chen len pa'i tshod pa bsgugs la
T02D2452:92a-13: de dang sbrag / rdo yi mi la rmi lam
T02D2452:92a-14: ci zhig dris kyang lan de 'od des med //
T02D2452:92a-15: na tsha sdug bsngal che dus rtsa ba de rang yin te thabs gzhan med //
T02D2452:92a-16: snang ba'i gzugs rnams sdigs su byung yang de nyid snying rje'i yul te logs na med //
T02D2452:92a-17: gshog gnyis rgyas pa'i rtsal des nam mkha' gar byas rkyen gnyis dbang du bsdus //
T02D2452:92a-18: gangs dkar rtse la nyam nga med pa'i seng ge rtsal la gsum rdzogs //
T02D2452:92a-19: sgo gnyis khyim spangs bsam gtan thun gyi zas bsten nam mkha' mdzod du byas //
T02D2452:92a-20: lce dang mtheb mo gnyis ka brag la seng ge
T02D2452:92a-21: bu dang sbrag / nam zhig 'brug la zhon nas
T02D2452:92a-23: lan tshva'i rgya mtshor chu rnams ro gcig tha dad med //
T02D2452:92a-24: rgya mtsho dangs pa'i nang na gza' skar gzugs brnyan
T02D2452:92a-25: snang ba su yis bzhag / byang lta'i phug pas
T02D2452:92a-26: nyi ma ma mthong gang gis len //
T02D2452:92a-27: dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i nor bu'i nus pa su la blangs //
T02D2452:92a-29: mchog gi brgyud pa las byung ba zab mo'i don to //
T02D2452:92a-30: bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma'i brda rin po che
T02D2452:92a-31: dbang gi 'khor lo gsal ba zhes bya ba dur
T02D2452:92a-32: khrod rgyu skar dpal gyi rol par gsungs pa rdzogs
